Consumed HP / SP / stamina can recover through the following features:
Natural recovery is slow compared to other recovery methods, but it does not require the player to do anything.
[Potion Recovery] : Recover HP/SP/Stamina immediately using potions.
Potions have cooldown times before you can reuse.
[Tree Root Crystal] : Destroy Tree Root Crystals to recover Stamina.
Tree Root Crystals are randomly generated around the field.
[Rest Mode] : Using bonfire during rest mode speeds up your recovery.
Recovery in Rest mode is faster than Natual recovery and it is even faster if you use bonfire during Rest mode.
